text: Gardens of Eden as a place of residence which they shall enter they along with those who were righteous those who believed from among their fathers and their spouses and their descendants even if these latter did not perform deeds of the same merit as theirs they shall share with them their stations of Paradise as an honouring for them; and the angels shall enter to them from every gate of the gates of Paradise or of the gates of the palaces of Paradise when they first enter in order to congratulate them.
